name: The Food Chain (Karto)
description:
A game where you turn into the creature that eats you!

There are multiple possible endings for each creature, good luck discovering all of them!

The deadline almost crushed me! Some things are unpolished but hopefully it all works in the final build! This was my first ever game jam, and working alone has been a really big challenge!

The art was completely done by me!

DONT READ FURTHER IF YOU WANT TO AVOID SPOILERS!  List of endings: Fly

Traitor - He was your friend! (Kill the fly under the rock by gnawing)

Frog Exterminator - Kill all the frogs 

Bully - Poor frog. He was stuck. Shameless. 

Compassionate - You have a kind heart! Wait you have a heart? (rescue the frog at the end)

Bye! - I guess you dont want to play (go left from fly spawn)

Fall of death - You’re literally a fly HOW 

Frog

Got your back - Leave no one behind! (jump down into the ditch at the end to give the trapped from company!)

Disease Cleanser - No more pesky flies gnawing away at everything!

Death by Splatter - Its just suicide, really. (squish yourself at the rock by pulling the small rock with tongue)

Bye! - I guess you dont want to play (go left from fly spawn)

Hound

Ecosystem collapse - Nothing lives - (This has not been implemented) but is still possible, a fun challenge if you're up to it!

Self imposed exile - Seriously? Like this? Apex predator who? YOU!? - Leave the ecosystem (go left from fly spawn)

Royally stupid death - Seriously? Like this? Apex predator who? YOU!? (fall to death right of spawn) 

Made for the brackeys 2023.1 GameJam
